title: Emerald Bloom Two-Layer Diamond Haaram
materials: Emeralds (కెంపులు) with excellent green color and clarity
Brilliant Cut Diamonds (వజ్రాలు) with VS clarity and IJ color. Crafted with meticulous detail
finished with a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: A breathtaking two-layer Haaram featuring a floral motif design. The piece showcases a delicate interplay of emeralds and brilliant-cut diamonds, expertly set in an open setting to maximize sparkle. The design draws inspiration from traditional South Indian floral patterns, giving it a classic yet contemporary feel. Intricate filigree work (తీగ పని) accentuates the design.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Ideal for traditional events like muhurtham
description: This exquisite Haaram represents the pinnacle of South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of premium quality emeralds and diamonds, set in 22K gold with Hyderabadi Polish, ensures lasting beauty and heirloom quality. It's a timeless piece that blends traditional aesthetics with modern elegance, making it a cherished addition to any jewelry collection. The floral design symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, making it especially auspicious for bridal wear.
